replies.body: hey i like how the champion caitlyn is on sale + the skin. u should do this more often insted of having random skins and random champs. if u dont understand what i mean : caitlyn on sale: sheriff caitlyn on sale, Trundle on sale: junkyard trundle on sale etc (trundle not actually on sale just giving examples

Nah random champs and skins is good. More people will own the champs then the skins. And say theres 5 skins for a champ. That means that champ would be on sale 5x more than a champ that only has 1 skin, if you wanted the champ/skin combo every time.
Just isn't efficient.
